round_best: Develop a novel machine learning algorithm that dynamically switches between global and local representational geometries during image analysis. This algorithm could utilize a hybrid neural network that integrates convolutional neural layers for local texture and detail recognition with graph-based neural layers for capturing and evaluating global geometric structures.
